about_the_game:
Embark on an intergalactic adventure with Unearthing Invasions, a thrilling 3D Tower Defense odyssey set amidst the vast expanse of space. In this cosmic battleground, resources are precious commodities, and you're at the helm of multiple outposts strategically scattered across asteroid fields and key areas.

ENERGY is the lifeblood of your operation, powering your bases and defenses. But beware, hostile alien species and factions are relentless in their pursuit to drain your energy reservoirs. Brace yourself for wave after wave of enemies, each posing a dire threat to your survival. Your mission? Hold the line, fortify your bases with powerful turrets, and repel the invaders at all costs.

The intensity ramps up as you cling to every last drop of energy. The more you retain, the more formidable your defenses become, unleashing devastating firepower upon your foes. But be vigilant—when energy levels plummet, so does your ability to withstand the onslaught.

FUNDS are your lifeline in this cosmic clash. As you venture into the fray with Unearthing Invasions, your starting resources dictate the fate of your defenses. With each outpost strategically positioned across the vast expanse of space, managing your funds becomes paramount.

But it's not just about firepower; it's about resilience. Salvage SCRAPS from fallen adversaries to repair your damaged turrets or strategically let them fall to replenish your resources. Every decision shapes your destiny in this high-stakes cosmic showdown.

Unearthing Invasions melds classic arcade action with innovative gameplay mechanics, offering an experience that's as exhilarating as it is strategic. Are you ready to defend your territory against the tide of cosmic invaders? Humanity depends on YOU!


Current features:


- Standard Tower defense mechanics. Buy and build turrets. Defeat enemies to gain funds, to build and upgrade more turrets.




---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- MyTurret mode: featured in some levels. You can buy a special turret that you control yourself! This turret is a first person view which allows you to help your turrets along in the onslaught! This turret can be upgraded twice, similar to the standard turrets.



Once you buy the MyTurret, youll jump right into controlling it. The controls shown in the levels are simplistic to follow, and there is a button that will allow you to go back and forth between the MyTurret and the top-down standard view!
